data.text: Nkɔmhyɛ a ɛfa Nweatam a ɛda Po ho no ho:
Wɔde adaeso a ɛyɛ nwonwa akyerɛ me:
Eyi ama ɔyaw bi abɛhyɛ me mu,
Sɛɛ na Awurade ka kyerɛ me:
Na ɔwɛmfo no teɛɛ mu se,
Hwɛ, ɔbarima bi a ɔte teaseɛnam mu na ɔreba yi
Ao, me nkurɔfo a, wɔadwerɛw mo wɔ awiporowbea ase
Momfa nsu mmrɛ wɔn a osukɔm de wɔn;
Sɛɛ na Awurade ka kyerɛ me, “Afe baako mu, sɛnea ɔsomfo a wayɛ nhyehyɛe bebubu nna no, Kedar kɛseyɛ to betwa.
Na agyantowfo a wɔbɛka ne Kedar akofo bɛyɛ kakraa bi.” Nea Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, aka ni.
